page.title: 15At the dentist
page.content: Most times when I go to the dentist I{feel scared.}Lately I have had three{fillings,}it was really horrible!! First I had my mouth {numbed}and made really{dry.}Then I had a kind of{vacuum}in my mouth to get all the pieces of food out. Then I had a{drill}which drilled a hole in my tooth, then the dentist fired loads of air into the hole. Boy did{it hurt,}it was{really {painful. Then she put some{goey stuff}in it which was the{filling}itself, then she kind of{sealed}it up with some queer stuff, then she blew some more air in and that hurt just as much as the first time. I hoped I'd never have to go again but I have to go every four months.{I hate it!
